Appledore Perspective: NETSCOUT Transformed

Appledore Research discusses NETSCOUT’s transformation into a diversified supplier of radio planning, subscriber analytics, and intelligent service assurance solutions to the telecommunication market.

What is NXDOMAIN or DNS NXDOMAIN Flood DDoS Attack?

What is NXDOMAIN and how can it be exploited? Find out more about how to prevent DNS NXDOMAIN flood DDoS attacks, where the attacker overwhelms the Domain Name System (DNS) server.

Low and Slow DDoS Attacks

A Low and Slow DDoS attack, also known as a slow-rate attack, involves what appears to be legitimate traffic at a very slow rate.

SSL/TLS Exhaustion DDoS Attacks

As more transactions and services are protected by SSL, DDoS attacks on SSL secured services are on the rise. Find out more about SSL/TLS exhaustion DDoS attacks.
